title: ****9/1 CHESTNUT HILL-BRIGHTON LARGE PET-FRIENDLY 1BED STEPS TO MBTA!
posting_body: A very spacious, and modernized 1 bedroom, 1 bath rental apartment located on Commonwealth Ave in Brighton-Boston.
The unit is located in a professionally managed building that is located just steps to the MBTA Green Line,  Boston University, Harvard Ave, Boston Landing, and Boston College!
Heat, hot water, and gas are included in the rent price, and there is shared laundry in the building.
Please email Ben with any questions or to schedule a viewing of the property!
Bus: 86, Chestnut Hill Ave @ Wallingford Rd (0.49 mi)
Bus: 501, Winship St @ Union St (0.47 mi)
Bus: 57, Cambridge St opp Elko St (0.48 mi)
Bus: 65, Washington St @ Commonwealth Ave (0.02 mi)
